title: Tiny Tales - Heart of the Forest Collector's Edition [ASG]
description:
No Need For Patches Or Serials Just Run Installer And Enjoy The Game!

When Max is called home by his mother he never thought that it would be the longest journey he would have to make. After a desperate search for money to save his childhood home, he finds his way into the story which will prove to be more challenging than he imagined. In a land plagued by drought and danger what can a tiny man do to save the day? Follow Max on his unexpected quest to discover a well-kept secret which, if revealed, could shake the very foundation of the kingdom of Brie, and become the hero of your own chapter in Tiny Tales: Heart of the Forest.

The Collector’s Edition Includes:
• Achievements and trophies!
• Wonderful hidden object scenes and challenging mini games
• Hours of fun in a magical forest

System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/Win8/Win10
CPU: 2 GHz RAM: 1024 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 1.8 GB

Work like you don't need money, love like you've never been hurt, and dance like no one's watching
- Unknown Author -

And Seed like there is no bandwidth limit

Support Us Your "Thank You" means a lot

Thanks To Velocity And Let's never forget the work of Flight of the Conchords
